bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of all types of lou chuang 漏瘡 , leaking sores. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 22: 治癰疽膿血內 漏，諸漏敗壞，男發背、女乳房及五痔，蝟皮散方 , “Recipe for the powder with hedgehog skin to treat obstruction- and impediment-illnesses with internal leakage of pus and blood, all types of leakage from destroyed and rotten [sores], effusion of the back in males, [sores affecting] female breasts, and the five types of piles”.
